p: The most common adverse effects reported for telbivudine are dizziness, fatigue, gastrointestinal symptoms, and rash. Unique adverse effects are peripheral neuropathy and myopathy with elevation in creatine kinase levels. Telbivudine treatment should be discontinued if either peripheral neuropathy or myopathy is diagnosed. The rate of resistance to telbivudine is 25% after 96 weeks of treatment.
